text:
When indexing Powerpoint content using MSPowerPointExtractor, content buffer is
never flushed. As a consequence, successive indexing causes old content to be
indexed.
creator: fabrice.dewasmes@openwide.fr

text:
Created attachment 15529
corrective patch

every content extraction now starts with a new buffer.
creator: fabrice.dewasmes@openwide.fr

text: Reset assignee so mails go to list.
creator: markt@apache.org
